topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5561021a6368722b0d201f00#post_5561021a6368722b0d201f00
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5560ffdf6368722b0dd81a00#post_5560ffdf6368722b0dd81a00
^~what you drawed?~^[/bq]
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5561021a6368722b0d201f00#post_5561021a6368722b0d201f00
~[spoiler]Remember those Adoptable DA Oc's?

Well I had to go look for another one because the person I left a message too like, apparently doesn't use DA anymore since like 2012.

So I found someone else! And one of the "Rules" he/she is saying you have to follow is to draw the character often.

So I took it as a challenge and decided to Draw the OC.

They haven't replied yet though so I'm still waiting. But whenever they do I have a pic literally sitting up to be posted.[/spoiler]~
